text: Władysław Filipowiak (29 April 1926 - 31 March 2014) was a Polish professor, writer, and archaeologist. He was a former director of the National Museum in Szczecin. He was the author of over 200 publications in the field of early medieval archeology. Filipowiak was born in Kaczycach, Poland. Filipowiak died on 31 March 2014 in Szczecin, Poland from natural causes, aged 87. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Archaeologists Category:Polish academics Category:Polish writers
title: Władysław Filipowiak
